problem.markdown:
Which of the laws explains the given phenomenon in nature:
The bubbles exhaled by a scuba diver grow as they approach the surface of the ocean.
[ ] Charle’s Law [x] Boyle’s Law [ ] Joule’s Law [ ] Ideal Gas Equation
[explanation] The pressure exerted by the weight of the water decreases with depth, so the volume of the bubbles increases as they rise. [explanation]
problem.p: Which of the laws explains the given phenomenon in nature:

div.p: The pressure exerted by the weight of the water decreases with depth, so the volume of the bubbles increases as they rise.
